Elosegui Martínez, F
Sabell Salgués, F

metadata.dc:description: The authors present a case of kidney pseudotumour and stress the difficulty of reaching a final diagnosis in relation to the course of therapy.
metadata.dc:title: Pseudotumor renal "cortical rest".
[Renal cortical rest pseudotumor].
